creator: rekhahh@arisglobal.co.in
text:
HI

 i am quite sucessfully able to generate PDF reports using XSL:FO. for Japanese characters support i am embedding msgothic ttf and .ttc files. Characters are successfully displayed in PDF reports, but unable to copy and paste Japanese characters   to word or notepad.   Copy paste is essential business need for our customer. 

We are using FOP 0.20.5,  If this issue is fixed, let me know FOP version where it is been fixed. 

Thanks,
Rekha HH

creator: bowditch_chris@hotmail.com
text: Not being able to C&P from PDF generated by 0.20.5 was a known bug in that version. It is fixed in 0.95. Please feel free to re-open the bug if you can recreate the problem in 0.95. Please note 0.20.5 is no longer supported.

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
